content: gardeners and plant lovers will love this design for its likeness in size and shape to a real terracotta pot this project works up quickly and should be easy for beginners stitch abbreviations us terms chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase work 2 single_crochet in one stitch *this pattern uses front loop and back loop only single_crochet size this finished piece will measure approx 4 tall 2 5 wide at the base and 4 5 wide at the rim
